channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Jeanine Pirro picked Trump as interim top federal prosecutor in D.C.
item.description: Ed Martin was the second Trump nominee in as many days to be pulled after it appeared they would not have the Senate votes to be confirmed.

item.title: Crypto regulation bill fails to advance in the Senate
item.description: Several Democrats who previously voted for the bill abruptly backed out, but the final vote wasn't close to the 60 needed to advance.

item.title: Trump’s plan to increase taxes on the rich could hit most U.S. businesses
Robert Prevost is first American pope: Leo XIV
item.description: Robert Francis Prevost, Pope Leo XIV, succeeds Pope Francis. Leo spent much of his ministry in Peru and was elected a Roman Catholic cardinal only in ...

item.title: Trump calls Robert Prevost's election as first U.S. pope 'such an honor'
item.description: Robert Francis Prevost took the papal name Leo XIV after his election as the first American-born pope in the history of the Roman Catholic Church.

item.title: Trump says a rate cut would be like 'jet fuel' for markets, but Powell doesn't want to do it
item.description: The Fed on Wednesday voted to keep its benchmark interest rate in a range of 4.25% to 4.5%, where it's kept it on hold since December.

item.title: Bitcoin rallies with stocks to top $100K again, as exuberance returns to markets
Why Trump’s tariffs may not disrupt U.S. economy as much as Wall Street expects
Trump’s U.K. trade deal is a relief — but other countries are more crucial
Dow closes just shy of exiting correction as stocks rise on U.S.-U.K. trade deal
